Text:
Great movie! The problem is that it's the seem one that's been going around on the Net. I haven't seen a DVD quality version yet. Can't wait!

Thanks for the upload. Too bad I already seen it.

After two weeks of no progress, a whole lot of people are still stuck around 70%. Seriously, is NO ONE seeding this? Can't some lucky people who have already downloaded this come forward for an hour or two and share? Normally, I'm patient with slow downloads, and I always seed plenty myself to be a good citizen and all that, but really, this d/l just ain't happening. Days and days and weeks of basically NOTHING. Would at least one person step up and take responsibility for doing the right thing here?
i heard its cos the torrents fake....
